Sentencas: A slight Nb2O5 co-doping in 11Sc(2)O(3)-89ZrO(2) was earlier reported to stabilize the high-symmetry cubic phase completely and enhances the conductivity significantly.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2

Sentencas: The present work looked at the temporal stability of conductivity in 1Nb(2)O(5)-10Sc(2)O(3)-89ZrO(2) (1Nb10ScSZ) for the electrolyte application in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2

Sentencas: In situ conductivity measurement was done using impedance spectroscopy at 650 degrees C in the air for 2000 h.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2

Sentencas: A substantial conductivity loss (29%) was observed in the first 1000 h. Following which, conductivity remained relatively stable for the next 1000 h. Impedance analysis showed that the main contribution to the conductivity degradation was from grain conductivity.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2

Sentencas: Phase analysis performed using XRD, TEM and Raman spectroscopy revealed that both the unaged and aged 1Nb10ScSZ samples consisted of metastable t-phase.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2

Sentencas: However, the extent of tetragonality was found to increase after ageing.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2

Sentencas: The formation of low-symmetry phase was suggested to be the reason for the grain conductivity loss in 1Nb10ScSZ.
Titulo: Temporal stability of oxygen-ion conductivity in 1Nb2O5-10Sc2O3-89ZrO2
